body:
cc @rachtsingh 

@eelxpeng can you point to which definition in the paper you're translating? It looks like [Proposition 2 part (a)](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1611.00712.pdf) is correctly implemented by `RelaxedBernoulli`, where `alpha` is a positive real location parameter (in odds units) and:
```py
log(alpha) == probs.log() - (-probs).log1p()
```
Or am I missing something?
